revised_title: The Properties and Uses of Slate for Building
tldr: The author discusses the various properties and qualities of slate, a popular building material for covering houses. He provides methods for testing the firmness and durability of slate and compares its cost-effectiveness to other materials like tiling, leading, and boarding. The author emphasizes the importance of selecting high-quality slate for long-lasting and aesthetically pleasing buildings.
